page.title: 02Attitudes in Hittisleigh
page.content: "A nice quiet friendly place" is how one resident summed up the village in reply to questions posed by the Parish Council. The majority of people are very happy with things as they are, though suggestions were made that lighting and van deliveries could be improved: A Saturday club for the young pople provided, with a disco, snooker, indoor soft-ball tennis and a Space Invaders video game. About Civil Defence only a minority offered opinions, but of those twice as many were against making emergency plans for a war-situation as those for, on the grounds of inducing a false feeling of security, naivety; and the risk of undermining international trust.
